short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effing Worms Unblocked free online action game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effing Worms will unleash your primal instincts and send shivers of excitement down your spine.

In this extraordinary masterpiece, you find yourself assuming the role of a colossal underground creature, a mighty worm of unparalleled proportions. Your insatiable hunger for flesh knows no bounds, and you are on a relentless quest to satisfy your voracious appetite. Picture yourself lurking in the darkness beneath the earth, eagerly awaiting the perfect moment to strike!

But wait, my friend, here's where the adrenaline truly begins to surge! Your sole objective in this thrilling adventure is to devour as much human and animal flesh as you can possibly sink your teeth into. The very thought of emerging from the ground, surprising unsuspecting prey, and sinking your monstrous fangs into their succulent forms will make your heart race with sheer exhilaration!

However, be prepared, for this world is not without its challenges. The feeble attempts of humanity to thwart your unstoppable rampage form the backdrop of an epic war. Their feeble military forces scramble to halt your unstoppable advance, desperately striving to protect themselves from becoming your next meal. It's a battle for their survival, while for you, my friend, it's nothing more than a scrumptious feast!

Imagine the thrill of strategizing your attacks, timing your strikes to perfection, and skillfully dodging the feeble resistance that attempts to hinder your insatiable hunger. The sheer power you possess as an enormous worm, capable of causing mayhem and destruction, will leave you breathless with anticipation!

So, brace yourself for a breathtaking experience unlike anything you've ever encountered. Effing Worms is not just a game; it's a wild ride that will awaken the primal beast within you. Get ready to savor the thrill of being the ultimate predator, feasting upon unsuspecting victims while eluding the feeble attempts of the human resistance. It's a gastronomic frenzy that will keep you on the edge of your seat, craving more with every succulent morsel devoured. Prepare for the feast of a lifetime!

Controls:
- A and D or Left and Right Arrow Key=Turn
- W or Up Arrow Key=Forward
- Space Bar=Pause
